title: Infection cycle for a typical retrovirus

content.question: During the infection cycle for a typical retrovirus, which uses RNA as genetic material, the genetic variation in the resulting population of new virus particles is very high because of

choices.label: damage to the virus particle from envelope loss during infection
errors introduced in the DNA molecule through reverse transcription
errors in the protein molecules produced in translation
recombination of the genomes of free virus particles

content.answer: errors introduced in the DNA molecule through reverse transcription
